tokens.resolved_gloss: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not

tokens.resolved_gloss: to yoke or hitch; by analogy, to fasten in any sense, to join battle
tokens.translation: to yoke or hitch; by analogy, to fasten in any sense, to join battle

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, what leaps forth, i.e. flash of fire, or a burning arrow; also (from the original sense of the root) a bond
tokens.translation: properly, what leaps forth, i.e. flash of fire, or a burning arrow; also (from the original sense of the root) a bond

tokens.resolved_gloss: to catch (in a net, trap or pit); generally, to capture or occupy; also to choose (by lot); figuratively, to cohere
tokens.translation: to catch (in a net, trap or pit); generally, to capture or occupy; also to choose (by lot); figuratively, to cohere

tokens.resolved_gloss: a rope (as twisted), especially a measuring line; by implication, a district or inheritance (as measured); or a noose (as of cords); figuratively, a company (as if tied together); a throe (especially of parturition); also ruin
tokens.translation: a rope (as twisted), especially a measuring line; by implication, a district or inheritance (as measured); or a noose (as of cords); figuratively, a company (as if tied together); a throe (especially of parturition); also ruin
